The '''Sociedad Tolkien Colombia Orodruin''' (Spanish: "Tolkien Society Colombia Orodruin"), or '''STCO''', is a [[Tolkien Societies|Tolkien Society]] based in Colombia. It is active in 2023 as it's Facebook page shows activity.

==History==
The society was founded on [[24 July]] [[1999]]<ref>Guillermo Correa, "''Editorial''" in ''Dragón Verde 1''</ref> by Guillermo Correa (1944-2020) and Alejandro Botero in [[wikipedia:Medellín|Medellín]]. They initially wanted to join the [[Spanish Tolkien Society]], but were encouraged to found their own society instead.<ref>Juan Diego Zapata Aguirre, ''[https://www.diarioadn.co/noticias/el-legado-de-tolkien-en-colombia+articulo+20005237 El legado de Tolkien en Colombia]'' on diarioadn.co (accessed 16 July 2023)</ref>

==Publications==
Since 2015, the society publishes an biannual journal called ''Dragón Verde'' (Spanish:" [[The Green Dragon|Green Dragon]]"). Notable cover artists have been [[Jemima Caitlin]], [[Donato Giancola]], [[Ted Nasmith]], [[Jenny Dolfen]], [[David Wenzel]], [[Anke Eißmann]] and [[Matěj Čadil]].
